LanguageData.VFEA_SuperJump.label: super jump
LanguageData.VFEA_SuperJump.description: Jump over a short distance (10 cells) within line of sight to close the distance to the enemy.
LanguageData.VFEA_Berserk.label: berserk (telepathy)
LanguageData.VFEA_Berserk.description: Cast on an enemy to turn them on their allies.
LanguageData.VFEA_Calm.label: calm (telepathy)
LanguageData.VFEA_Calm.description: Cast on a friend to instantly snap them out of a mental break.
LanguageData.VFEA_PsychicShock.label: psychic shock
LanguageData.VFEA_PsychicShock.description: Fire a psychic shock on the enemy, rendering them unconscious.
LanguageData.VFEA_Invisibility.label: invisibility
LanguageData.VFEA_SelfControl.label: self-control
LanguageData.VFEA_SelfControl.description: When activated, immediately stop any mental breaks this pawn is under effect of.
LanguageData.VFEA_Overshield.label: overshield
LanguageData.VFEA_Overshield.description: Generate an impenetrable shield around yourself that lasts 30 seconds.
LanguageData.VFEA_SummonLightning.label: summon lightning
LanguageData.VFEA_SummonLightning.description: Designate an area that will be blasted by lightning bolts.
LanguageData.VFEA_AnimalSpeech.label: animal speech
LanguageData.VFEA_AnimalSpeech.description: When cast on a man hunting animal, calms it. When cast on a wild animal, tame it.
LanguageData.VFEA_Empathy.label: empathy
LanguageData.VFEA_Empathy.description: Cast on an ally to give them a strong mood buff lasting 24 hours.
LanguageData.VFEA_Heal.label: heal others
LanguageData.VFEA_Heal.description: Cast on an ally to cure them of all their wounds.
LanguageData.VFEA_GloryKill.label: glory kill
LanguageData.VFEA_GloryKill.description: Kill a random enemy in 1 cell radius, spawning large amount of blood everywhere, and removing a random amount of their limbs.
LanguageData.VFEA_ElectromagneticPulse.label: electro-magnetic pulse
LanguageData.VFEA_ElectromagneticPulse.description: Generate a large EMP explosion around yourself, disabling all electronics in radius.
LanguageData.VFEA_FireBreath.label: fire breath
LanguageData.VFEA_FireBreath.description: Spew fire up to 12 cells range in front of you, burning enemies and sending them running.
LanguageData.VFEA_IceBreath.label: ice breath
LanguageData.VFEA_IceBreath.description: Spew ice up to 12 cells range in front of you, slowing enemies and applying high hypothermia.
LanguageData.VFEA_LaserEyes.label: laser eyes
LanguageData.VFEA_LaserEyes.description: Fire an incredibly powerful beam of energy from your eyes. Maximum range is 35.
LanguageData.VFEA_MatterPhasing.label: matter phasing
LanguageData.VFEA_MatterPhasing.description: Turn on to phase through walls for 10 seconds.
LanguageData.VFEA_ElectricityBlast.label: electricity blast
LanguageData.VFEA_ElectricityBlast.description: Fire an arc of lightning that bounced between enemies, burning them and disabling any electronics.
LanguageData.VFEA_SpeedBurst.label: speed burst
LanguageData.VFEA_SpeedBurst.description: 4x Movement speed. Melee cooldown halved. Lasts 30 seconds.
LanguageData.VFEA_AcidBreath.label: acid spitting
LanguageData.VFEA_AcidBreath.description: The subject has developed sacs of concentrated chemicals in their chest. The sacs are connected via tubes to the corners of their mouth and can be squirted out by contracting their chest when spitting, reacting with oxygen and forming globs of caustic jelly.
LanguageData.VFEA_Fireball.label: fireball
LanguageData.VFEA_Fireball.description: The subject has developed a sac of jellied chemfuel in the palm of their hand along with numerous glands. Once every 30 seconds, these glands extrude a glob of napalm into a closed fist which can then be tossed out to ignite with the air, before landing and setting a small area on fire.
LanguageData.VFEA_MetamorphosisTurtle.label: metamorphosis (turtle)
LanguageData.VFEA_MetamorphosisTurtle.description: The subject is capable of temporarily exerting a psychic force which forces their body to take the shape of what the mind is convinced it should be. In this case, they adopt the form of a tortoise, with the same health, size and abilities, before their body snaps back into its actual shape after 60 seconds.
LanguageData.VFEA_MetamorphosisWarg.label: metamorphosis (warg)
LanguageData.VFEA_MetamorphosisWarg.description: The subject is capable of temporarily exerting a psychic force which forces their body to take the shape of what the mind is convinced it should be. In this case, they adopt the form of a warg, with the same health, size and abilities, before their body snaps back into its actual shape after 60 seconds.
